description: This command returns a list of the invoices, issued to the user, executing the command, or its subusers.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Show only invoices with the following recipient(s):SELF (default value): the user, executing the command;SUBUSER: subuser(s) of the user, executing the command
Execute the command as if it were executed by a subuser with SUBUSER account ID
Index of the first entry to be returned
Maximal number of entries to be returned
Show only invoices with given invoice details
Return invoice details data of given types
Order the response list by:DATE: invoice issue date, ascending;DATEDESC: invoice issue date, descending;INVOICEID: invoice ID, ascending;INVOICEIDDESC: invoice ID, descending
paramaters.Type: DATE, DATEDESC, INVOICEID, INVOICEIDDESC or NULL

paramaters.Definition: The minimal invoice ID in the response list
The maximal invoice ID in the response list
Show only invoices with the given status:NEWACTIVECANCELED
